title: Plans and Pricing to Fit Your Needs
subTitle: Whether you need just one cloud server, load balancer, or digital marketing campaign we can create a plan that is simple and afforable for your business needs. We offer custom plans that are tailored exactly to what you need without the extra fat that runs up costs.
textUnder: We also offer customized plans that can fit your budget needs. Annual plans come with a discount for paying upfront. Get in touch with us to see what solution will work for you.

staterPlan.name: Starter Plan
staterPlan.description: Best option for simple projects and low-traffic websites
features: Bunny CDN for fast global content delivery

proPlan.name: Pro Plan
proPlan.description: Suited for businesses running more complex needs and services
features: Upgraded Cloudflare plan for better protection
